name: poli.
description:
Poli is a three in one tap tap game for tap game lovers. It is your favourite one tap games in one app.

In Poli.Curl, you are a snake and you make zigzag moves to stay on the platform.

In Poli.Knock, you try to keep your ball on the platform with the help of walls on the end of each side and progress.

In Poli.Jump, you go up with your ball and try to top out.
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
